name: Principia Alchemia
description:
Build Up Your Alchemy Circuits.

Early 19th century, England.
The main character, an alchemist, sets up his workshop in a new city.
He meets people, receives requests, and live in a corner of the world that is changing dramatically.

Principia Alchemia is an alchemical programming puzzle game.
Assemble a limited type of parts to make your alchemy circuit work.
-- There is only one goal, but there is more than one solution.

Features
  • Based on a real programming language.
  • 8 tutorials + 26 problems from easy to (a bit) hard.
  • The less familiar with programming, the more you will enjoy the trial and error process.
  • Optimize your circuit to reduce its cost.
  • Edit mode to make problems and export/import them.
Controls
  • Mouse - Click to select, drag to move and right-click to context menu
  • Keyboard - Text input and some functions
Note

The original version is in Japanese. It's the first time to localize my game. Please notice me if it doesn't work well.
I'm not good at English and I used DeepL Translate for most of the text, so I'd appriciate if you could help me to improve it.

Made with Wolf RPG Editor.  Thanks to all creaters of assets included in this game.
